entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023
